div.p:
Intermolecular interactions of the most energetic pembrolizumab heavy-chain residues. ( a) Structural representation of the residues Y33
HC , Y101
HC , R102
HC and F103
HC within the PD-1 binding site. ( b)–( f) Interaction of these amino-acids with the most relevant residues of the receptor PD-1, respectively. Dashed lines in light blue (purple) (marine) represent direct (water-mediated) (non-conventional) hydrogen bonds, and the green lines represent σ- π interactions.
